name: Greninja & Zoroark GX
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Dark Pulse
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of {D} Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Union GX
attacks.effect: Put 2 in any combination of {D} Pokémon-GX and {D} Pokémon-EX from your discard pile onto your Bench. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), attach 2 Energy cards from your discard pile to each Pokémon that you put onto your Bench in this way. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.
